entries.meaning: (uncountable) A dish, commonly associated with French cuisine, consisting of edible snails.
examples: J. is dating P. at NYU and modeling on the side. They're planning to meet us in Paris for spring break so J. can go to some look-sees (and eat some escargot, obv.).

entries.meaning: (countable) A snail (often Helix pomatia) used in preparation of that dish.
